Title: Relates to enacting the adjoining owners' bill of rights
Summary: Relates to enacting the "adjoining owners' bill of rights"; requires the department of buildings to make available on its website an "adjoining owners' bill of rights" advising homeowners who are adjacent to a property under development or construction of their rights and available resources.
LawCode: Add ยง28-103.34, NYC Ad Cd
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to enacting the "adjoining owners' bill of rights"
